languages.text: {n}На губах Наместника возникает бледная улыбка.{/n} "Впрочем, дружба с этой организацией столь же выгодна, сколь опасна вражда. И, так уж вышло, что я смог завоевать их доверие, и на Футфоле свои дела они ведут под моим надзором". {n}Полный намека взгляд устремляется в вашу сторону.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На губах наместника возникает бледная улыбка.{/n} "Впрочем, дружба с этой организацией столь же выгодна, сколь опасна вражда. И, так уж вышло, что я смог завоевать их доверие, и на Футфоле свои дела они ведут под моим надзором". {n}Полный намека взгляд устремляется в вашу сторону.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A pale ghost of a smile appears on his lips.{/n} "Still, making friends with this organisation is as profitable as it is dangerous to make enemies of them. And it just so happens that I've managed to earn their trust, and on Footfall, they conduct their business under my watchful eye." {n}He sends you a meaningful look.{/n}

И, так уж вышло, что я смог завоевать их доверие, и на Футфоле свои дела они ведут под моим надзором". {n}Полный намека взгляд устремляется в вашу сторону.{/n}

And it just so happens that I've managed to earn their trust, and on Footfall, they conduct their business under my watchful eye." {n}He sends you a meaningful look.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その唇が青白い幽霊じみた笑顔を作る。{/n}「それでも、この組織と友好を築くことは、敵に回すことと同じくらい危険でありながら利益も大きい。たまたま相手の信頼を勝ち取ることができたから、フットフォールで彼らは私の監視下でビジネスを行っている」{n}男はこちらに意味ありげな視線を送る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pale ghost of a smile appears on his lips.{/n} "Still, making friends with this organisation is as profitable as it is dangerous to make enemies of them. And it just so happens that I've managed to earn their trust, and on Footfall, they conduct their business under my watchful eye." {n}He sends you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その唇が青白い幽霊じみた笑顔を作る。{/n}「それでも、この組織と友好を築くことは、敵に回すことと同じくらい危険でありながら利益も大きい。たまたま相手の信頼を勝ち取ることができたから、フットフォールで彼らは私の監視下でビジネスを行っている」{n}男はこちらに意味ありげな視線を送る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他的嘴唇上浮现了一丝苍白的微笑。{/n}“话虽如此，与他们交朋友是有利可图的，而与他们为敌则非常危险。碰巧的是，我已经赢得了他们的信任，而他们也会在我的监督下，在落脚港上经营他们的业务。”{n}他意味深长地看了你一眼。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pale ghost of a smile appears on his lips.{/n} "Still, making friends with this organisation is as profitable as it is dangerous to make enemies of them. And it just so happens that I've managed to earn their trust, and on Footfall, they conduct their business under my watchful eye." {n}He sends you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他的嘴唇上浮现了一丝苍白的微笑。{/n}“话虽如此，与他们交朋友是有利可图的，而与他们为敌则非常危险。碰巧的是，我已经赢得了他们的信任，而他们也会在我的监督下，在落脚港上经营他们的业务。”{n}他意味深长地看了你一眼。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un pálido intento de sonrisa aparece en sus labios.{/n} «Aun así, trabar amistad con esta organización es tan conveniente como peligroso enemistarse con ella. Y, como da la casualidad de que he conseguido ganarme su confianza, en Paso ejercen sus negocios bajo mi atenta mirada». {n}Te dedica una mirada cargada de significado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pale ghost of a smile appears on his lips.{/n} "Still, making friends with this organisation is as profitable as it is dangerous to make enemies of them. And it just so happens that I've managed to earn their trust, and on Footfall, they conduct their business under my watchful eye." {n}He sends you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un pálido intento de sonrisa aparece en sus labios.{/n} «Aun así, trabar amistad con esta organización es tan conveniente como peligroso enemistarse con ella. Y, como da la casualidad de que he conseguido ganarme su confianza, en Paso ejercen sus negocios bajo mi atenta mirada». {n}Te dedica una mirada cargada de significado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'ombre d'un sourire apparaît sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Cela étant, s'il est dangereux de se mettre cette organisation à dos, il est aussi très profitable de s'en faire des amis. Il se trouve que j'ai justement réussi à gagner leur confiance, ce qui fait qu'ils opèrent à Castel sous mon œil vigilant. » {n}Il vous lance un regard entendu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pale ghost of a smile appears on his lips.{/n} "Still, making friends with this organisation is as profitable as it is dangerous to make enemies of them. And it just so happens that I've managed to earn their trust, and on Footfall, they conduct their business under my watchful eye." {n}He sends you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'ombre d'un sourire apparaît sur ses lèvres.{/n} « Cela étant, s'il est dangereux de se mettre cette organisation à dos, il est aussi très profitable de s'en faire des amis. Il se trouve que j'ai justement réussi à gagner leur confiance, ce qui fait qu'ils opèrent à Castel sous mon œil vigilant. » {n}Il vous lance un regard entendu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der blasse Geist eines Lächelns erscheint auf seinen Lippen.{/n} "Dennoch ist eine Freundschaft mit dieser Organisation ebenso profitabel, wie eine Feindschaft mit ihr gefährlich ist. Zufällig habe ich ihr Vertrauen gewonnen, und auf Footfall überwacht mein aufmerksamer Blick ihre Geschäfte." {n}Er wirft dir einen bedeutungsvollen Blick zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pale ghost of a smile appears on his lips.{/n} "Still, making friends with this organisation is as profitable as it is dangerous to make enemies of them. And it just so happens that I've managed to earn their trust, and on Footfall, they conduct their business under my watchful eye." {n}He sends you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der blasse Geist eines Lächelns erscheint auf seinen Lippen.{/n} "Dennoch ist eine Freundschaft mit dieser Organisation ebenso profitabel, wie eine Feindschaft mit ihr gefährlich ist. Zufällig habe ich ihr Vertrauen gewonnen, und auf Footfall überwacht mein aufmerksamer Blick ihre Geschäfte." {n}Er wirft dir einen bedeutungsvollen Blick zu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dudaklarında solgun bir gülümseme emaresi beliriyor.{/n} "Yine de bu örgütün düşmanlığı ne kadar tehlikeliyse dostluğu da bir o kadar kârlı. Neyse ki güvenlerini kazanmayı başardım. Binliman'daki işlerini benim dikkatli gözetimim altında yürütüyorlar." {n}Sana anlamlı bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A pale ghost of a smile appears on his lips.{/n} "Still, making friends with this organisation is as profitable as it is dangerous to make enemies of them. And it just so happens that I've managed to earn their trust, and on Footfall, they conduct their business under my watchful eye." {n}He sends you a meaningful look.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dudaklarında solgun bir gülümseme emaresi beliriyor.{/n} "Yine de bu örgütle dostluk kurmak kârlı iken düşman edinmek tehlikeli. Şans bu ya güvenlerini kazanmayı başardım, Binliman'da işlerini benim gözetimimde yürütüyorlar." {n}Sana anlamlı bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
